DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to evaluate the sparing effect of Lidocaine on doses of propofol and remifentanil.
DOC.criteria: patients ASA 1, 2 or 3 scheduled for a general anesthesia surgical procedure (abdominal surgery, urology, ENT major procedure) lasting between 1 and 3 hours age under 18 years simultaneous general and locoregional anesthesia allergy to NSAID treatment with verapamil, ketamine or gabapentin patients receiving an opioid preoperatively severe hepatic insufficiency contraindication to lidocaine contraindication to propofol or to remifentanil history of central nervous system disease patients receiving a psychotropic treatment patients with a pacemaker
